meanings.sent1: Yestreen was a time for reflection on the day that passed.
meanings.sent2: We had a lovely dinner yestreen with our friends.
meanings.sent3: Yestreen, I almost forgot to wish you goodnight!
meanings.sent4: The shadows of yestreen lingered in the corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The magic of yestreen whispered in the cool night air.

meanings.sent1: We finished our work yestreen just before sunset.
meanings.sent2: Yestreen, we watched a beautiful sunset by the beach.
meanings.sent3: Yestreen, the stars seemed to twinkle brighter than usual.
